cast.name: 吉娜·希门尼斯 Gina Jimenez

introduction: Rufus and his uncle Alpha, both from Côte d'Ivoire, run an ageing hotel in the hinterland around Perpignan. At the beginning of the summer, Alpha returns to Côte d'Ivoire to sell some family land to support his business in France, before handing it over to his nephew. In the meantime, Rufus looks after the hotel with his girlfriend Monika, but Alpha's journey to his homeland turns his plans upside-down…源自：https://www.premiersplans.org/festival/en/selection_officielle-competition-CM-film.php?id=9398&p=2
